name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends: Definitive Edition
overview: Features of the DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Definitive Edition ・Includes the content from DYNASTY WARRIORS 8, as well as the additional features from DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends, in a single game. ・A rich Story Mode. ・A plentiful variety of game modes that will have you keep coming back for more. ・Includes all of the downloadable content from past versions of the game.
